Plot: In 1950s Connecticut, a housewife faces a marital crisis and mounting racial tensions in the outside world.
Title: Far from Heaven
Actors: Julianne Moore, Dennis Quaid, Dennis Haysbert, Patricia Clarkson
tomatoConsensus: An exquisitely designed and performed melodrama, Far From Heaven earns its viewers' tears with sincerity and intelligence.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 100 wins & 86 nominations.
